testcase.name: jdk7::urandomfix OracleLinux on operatingsystem OracleLinux should contain Exec[set urandom /etc/sysconfig/rngd] with user => "root"
jdk7::urandomfix OracleLinux on operatingsystem OracleLinux should contain Service[rngd] with ensure => "running" and enable => true
jdk7::urandomfix OracleLinux on operatingsystem OracleLinux should contain Exec[chkconfig rngd] with user => "root" and command => "chkconfig --add rngd"
